#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include <algorithm>
#include<cmath>

using namespace std;


/*long long int primefactors(long long int s,long long int t)
{
    long long int d=sqrt(s);

    if(t%2==0)
    while(s%2==0)
    {
        //printf("2  ");
        s=s/2;
    }

    for(long long int i=3;i<=d;i+=2)
    {
        if(t%i==0)
        while(s%i==0)
        {
            //printf("%d ",i);
            s=s/i;
        }
    }

    return s;
}
*/
long long int HCF(long long int a,long long int b)

{

    if(a%b==0)
    return b;
    else
    HCF(b,a%b);
}

long long int max(long long int a,long long int b)
{
    if(a>b)
    return a;
    else return b;
}

long long int min(long long int a,long long int b)
{

    if(a<b)
    return a;
    else return b;
}
int main()
{
    long long int t,K;
    long long int a,b;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%llu %llu",&a,&b);
        //b=primefactors(b,a);


       do
        {

            K=HCF(max(a,b),min(a,b));
            b=b/K;
        }while(K!=1);

        if(b==1)
        printf("Yes\n");
        else
        printf("No\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
